mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.order_sn, o.coupon_id, o.integration, o.member_id, o.is_gift, o.delivery_type, o.store_id, o.store_name, o.store_address, o.store_phone, o.pay_amount, o.total_amount, o.freight_amount, o.promotion_amount, o.integration_amount, o.coupon_amount, o.discount_amount, ot.id ot_id, ot.order_id ot_order_id, ot.order_sn ot_order_sn, ot.product_id ot_product_id, ot.product_name ot_product_name, ot.product_pic ot_product_pic, ot.product_brand ot_product_brand, ot.product_sn ot_product_sn, ot.product_price ot_product_price, ot.product_quantity ot_product_quantity, ot.product_sku_id ot_product_sku_id, ot.product_sku_code ot_product_sku_code, ot.product_attr ot_product_attr, ot.real_amount ot_real_amount, ot.gift_integration ot_gift_integration, ot.gift_growth ot_gift_growth, ot.product_category_id ot_product_category_id, ot.promotion_name ot_promotion_name, ot.promotion_amount ot_promotion_amount, ot.coupon_amount ot_coupon_amount, ot.integration_amount ot_integration_amount FROM oms_order o LEFT JOIN oms_order_item ot ON o.id = ot.order_id WHERE o.id = #{orderId}

SELECT o.id, o.order_sn, o.coupon_id, o.integration, o.member_id, o.use_integration, o.delivery_type, o.store_id, o.store_name, o.store_address, o.store_phone, ot.id ot_id, ot.order_id ot_order_id, ot.order_sn ot_order_sn, ot.product_id ot_product_id, ot.product_name ot_product_name, ot.product_pic ot_product_pic, ot.product_brand ot_product_brand, ot.product_sn ot_product_sn, ot.product_price ot_product_price, ot.product_quantity ot_product_quantity, ot.product_sku_id ot_product_sku_id, ot.product_sku_code ot_product_sku_code, ot.product_attr ot_product_attr, ot.real_amount ot_real_amount, ot.gift_integration ot_gift_integration, ot.gift_growth ot_gift_growth, ot.product_category_id ot_product_category_id, ot.promotion_name ot_promotion_name, ot.promotion_amount ot_promotion_amount, ot.coupon_amount ot_coupon_amount, ot.integration_amount ot_integration_amount FROM oms_order o LEFT JOIN oms_order_item ot ON o.id = ot.order_id WHERE o.status = 0 AND o.create_time < date_add(NOW(), INTERVAL -#{minute} MINUTE);
